meanings.sent1: In the past two decennaries, technology has advanced rapidly.
meanings.sent2: The company has been in business for several decennaries.
meanings.sent3: It took a couple of decennaries for the tree to grow so tall.
meanings.sent4: The decennaries of hard work finally paid off for the dedicated team.
meanings.sent5: The decennaries of friendship between them were evident in their laughter and stories.

meanings.definition: A group or set of ten.
meanings.sent1: She bought a decennaries of colorful balloons for the party.
meanings.sent2: The decennaries of pencils were neatly arranged on the desk.
meanings.sent3: He found a decennaries of seashells on the beach and decided to keep them.
meanings.sent4: The decennaries of stars in the sky twinkled brightly that night.
meanings.sent5: The baker prepared a decennaries of cupcakes for the school event.
